definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
from beginning to end/in its entirety/in accord with fact/literal
variant of 原原本本[yuan2 yuan2 ben3 ben3]
variant of 原原本本[yuan2 yuan2 ben3 ben3]

sentences.english: I just wanted to write down everything the professor said and memorize it.
sentences.chinese: 我就是把教授講的話原原本本紀錄下來然後記住。

sentences.english: FY : Well, if there were, You would not tell me.
sentences.chinese: 如果你喜歡他，你也不會原原本本地告訴我了。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, Huang Jizhong translates religion and Western culture contents almost word for word out.
sentences.chinese: 黃繼忠將有關西方文化內容原原本本地翻譯了出來。

sentences.english: To the unit, ground of my meaning from beginning to end Xiaoyao said to Rena .
sentences.chinese: 到單位，我把小姚的意思原原本本地對麗娜說了。

sentences.english: This model is seldom actually implemented as is.
sentences.chinese: 該模型實際上很少被原原本本地實現。

sentences.english: He gave a full account of what happened in the school yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 他把昨天學校發生的事原原本本敘述了一遍。

sentences.english: She gave him a full account of her conversation with the doctor.
sentences.chinese: 她向他原原本本地轉述了自己和醫生的對話。

sentences.english: Evidently he expected to restore their old friendship at once and without modification.
sentences.chinese: 很顯然，他是想立刻原原本本地恢復他們往日的交情。

sentences.english: He wasn't involved that much, due to Robben's great form.
sentences.chinese: 因爲本本狀態好，小配參與比賽不太多。

sentences.english: Arjen has totally recovered from his injury. Chances are great that he will play with his team tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 本本已經痊癒了，極有可能參加明天的比賽。

sentences.english: If acomputer is powerful at games, do you need anything more?
sentences.chinese: 如果本本遊戲功能超強，你還需要什麼呢？

sentences.english: As I stood in line, I kept staring at the planner displayed on the counter.
sentences.chinese: 我排隊時，一直盯着櫃檯上陳列的本本。

sentences.english: This makes the laptop into just a screen with a handle.
sentences.chinese: 這樣讓本本看起來就像一個有把手的屏幕。

sentences.english: She told me the whole story exactly as it happened.
sentences.chinese: 她把發生的事源源本本地告訴了我。

sentences.english: Now I want to know about this thing from beginning to end.
sentences.chinese: 我現在想源源本本地瞭解此事。

sentences.english: Women want you to love them for exactly who they are.
sentences.chinese: 女人想要你愛原原本本的她。

definition: book/notebook/Japanese-style self-published comic (esp. an erotic one), aka "dōjinshi"/CL:本[ben3]/edition
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
